directions: Melt butter in a saute pan over medium heat.  Saute garlic and anchovies until the garlic has mellowed, about 2 to 3 minutes.  Pour in the mushroom soup, cream, and half and half; turn heat to low and cook for 45 minutes, making sure the mixture does not boil.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
title: Mushroom Bagna Cauda
